pid: idesia polycarpa maxim. var. vestita diels

basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period October-November
basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color yellow green

display_pid: Idesia polycarpa Maxim. var. vestita Diels

maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
